archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0330
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Is it possible to carry forward and match a customers legacy bill due date

properties.value: About transfering the duedate - its about starting the order in the future to align due date with subscription billing How does this apply for subscription model? Date alignment? Maybe it would be enough if the transition date is used for the first payment and the manual date alignment feature could be used to move it later. To be confirmed by VF. Confirmed.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
